name: Reinforcements
description: Your switching characters will always be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. After you defeat an opposing character with a Combat Action: You gain an extra Round and can continue performing Actions.
descriptionraw: Your <color=#FFFFFFFF>switching characters</color> will always be considered a $[K2] instead of a $[K1]. <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you defeat an opposing character with a $[K1]:</color> You gain an extra Round and can continue performing Actions.
descriptionreplaced: Your <color=#FFFFFFFF>switching characters</color> will always be considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>. <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you defeat an opposing character with a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>:</color> You gain an extra Round and can continue performing Actions.
